name: Mark Set Go!
overview: A multi event sports competition game published in Golden Disk 64 1991/06. here are over seven different disciplines to choose from. A game fun alone or with several. All graphics are drawn in detail, the animations of the fighters are perfect. With MARK-SET-GO you are right there, the real competitive atmosphere comes up when you play! A really gripping game in which you have to prove your skills in the individual disciplines and give your full effort. ◉ 100M DASH ◉ LONG JUMP ◉ 400M DASH ◉ TRAINING CAMP ◉ BOXING ◉ GUN SHOOTING ◉ SHOOTING RANGE
